gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 133, Celtics 131
gameRecap.excerpt: Bennedict Mathurin went 2/3 from the free throw line with .3 seconds remaining to lift the Pacers over the Celtics, 133-131. Mathurin recorded 26 points, four rebounds, and three assists for the Pacers, with Myles Turner adding 16 points and eight rebounds in the victory. Jaylen Brown tallied a season-high 40 points, along with five rebounds for the Celtics in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 21-15 in the regular season, while the Celtics fall to 28-8.
